levels.label: LEVEL1
levels.description: This is the first level, enjoy the game!

levels.label: LEVEL2
levels.description: Watch out for the bombs! There are bomb items in the second level, and you will lose 2 health points if you touch the bomb items!

levels.label: LEVEL3
levels.description: More bombs are coming! Pay attention to them!

levels.label: LEVEL4
levels.description: We've added angelheart to the field, and you'll restore all your health points when you touch it. Meanwhile, still be careful of the bombs!

levels.label: LEVEL5
levels.description: This is the final trial! Go ahead, warrior!
